directions: Mix together mayonnaise, chili sauce, mustard, olive oil, hot sauce, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce. Stir in scallions, parsley, olives, celery, capers, and garlic. Season with chili powder, and salt and pepper. Cover, and refrigerate.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Louisiana-style hot sauce, or to taste
title: Remoulade Sauce a la New Orleans
